subject: 回复：更换部件尚未收到！！！
content:
{"description":"Hello,

I mean, I do not see a point in this anymore. It has been 2 months since I
contacted you, and my problem has not been solved.
If there is no progress in the next 24 hours, I'll just take my loss and
buy another pedals but I'll go public in any possible way (Reddit, Facebook
groups, Discord, YouTube...etc), and I'll make sure that I reach as much
people as I can to let them know about this experience and how hard it is
to solve small issues, so I can't even imagine how it would be for bigger
ones.
I do not think this is fair to me as a customer. This is such a small issue
that prevents me from using my pedals in the way I enjoy.

Best regards!
Vlado Vrlika

On Fri, Jan 23, 2026 at 1:08 AM Vlado Vrlika <vvrlika@gmail.com> wrote:

> Hello,
>
> on November 27. I have contacted you about problems with the hydraulic
> damper on my throttle pedal, and on December 8. you replied that the
> replacement part will be sent out to me, but till today, I have not
> received it, and it has been almost 2 months now since the first contact!
>
> Attached, I'm sending the whole conversation, so you can check it if
> needed.
>
> Best regards!
> Vlado Vrlika
>
